merpi_desc: %USER's tail. Long or short, you probably shouldn't snort it. You could reach out and...

merpi_normal: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail!!
merpi_flowery: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail!!

merpi_normal: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their tail with soft caresses.
merpi_flowery: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their tail with soft caresses.

merpi_normal: %USER wraps %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail, squeezing comfortably.
merpi_flowery: %USER wraps %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail, squeezing comfortably.

merpi_normal: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail maybe a bit too hard.
merpi_flowery: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail maybe a bit too hard.

merpi_normal: %USER is really just choking the shit out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their tail!
